faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about the Slow Zoom Effect

items.title: What is the slow zoom effect?
items.description: The slow zoom effect gradually zooms into an image or part of an image, creating a dynamic presentation that engages viewers and adds movement.

items.title: Can I customize the zoom speed?
items.description: Currently, the effect uses a standard smooth zoom speed. We are working on features for more customization in the future.

items.title: What formats can I upload?
items.description: You can upload JPG, PNG, and WebP images to create your slow zoom effects.

items.title: Does my image stay private?
items.description: Absolutely! All processing occurs in your browser, ensuring that your photos are never uploaded or stored externally.
